The data show metered electricity usage (kW) for 370 customers.

This data can be accessed at https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/ElectricityLoadDiagrams20112014

### Imports

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(broom)
```

### Set theme for plots 

```{r}
theme_set(theme_light())
```
